title: A preparatiue to mariage The summe whereof was spoken at a contract, and inlarged after. Whereunto is annexed a treatise of the Lords Supper, and another of vsurie. By Henrie Smith.
author: Smith, Henry, 1550?-1591.
publisher: By Thomas Orwin for Thomas Man, dwelling in Paternoster row at the signe of the Talbot,
